free to actually interact. I will. I will. Because I'll be taking off my own little discourse
here. I'm actually very pleased with this concept. One of the struggles that I've had
over the years has been, as you mentioned, to find a completely contemporary formulation

year after year after year with different vocabulary and so forth. Finally, I found

a language for the individual to understand what they are experiencing, and also a language
with which they can communicate to others about their experience. Most human beings
are, I say they are, alexithymic. This is a fancy word in Greek. It actually is a specific

experience, and so forth. So most human beings are unable to be precise about what they experience

empowering concepts and created a contemporary vocabulary for those concepts with regards

And what's the advantage of separating them?
Then they merely add together. If you can't separate them in awareness, they multiply
